title.rendered: Macallan 1980 16 Year Old Signatory Vintage / Sherry Cask

excerpt.rendered:
A 1980 Macallan aged for at least 16 years and bottled at 55.1% abv from Sherry cask #5626 by Signatory Vintage in 1996. One of only 255 bottles.

Bottle size : 750ml
Distillery : Macallan
Age : 16
Vintage : 1980
ABV : 55.1%
